setting.title: View dailyhistoricalliverate
setting.query: select min(dailyhistoricalliverate_dailyhistoricalliverateid) as dailyhistoricalliverate_dailyhistoricalliverateid, cast(dailyhistoricalliverate_date as date) as dailyhistoricalliverate_date,min(currency_currency) as currency_currency from tbl_dailyhistoricalliverate join tbl_liverate on liverate_liverateid=dailyhistoricalliverate_liverateid join tbl_currency on currency_currencyid=liverate_currencyid $Search$ group by cast(dailyhistoricalliverate_date as date),liverate_currencyid
setting.where: ('$dailyhistoricalliverate_currencyid$' = '0' OR liverate_currencyid = '$dailyhistoricalliverate_currencyid$') AND dailyhistoricalliverate_date BETWEEN '$dailyhistoricalliverate_date_from$' AND '$dailyhistoricalliverate_date_to$'
